attributes.action: amend legislation to protect residents where there is a gross infringment of privacy under permitted development.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There is no provision to oppose under
current legislation,elevated positions
are not taken into account as well as
distance between properties.From an
elavated position the perception of
windows looking into your living areas
regardless to whether windows have obscure glazing is a gross infringment
of privacy.
